content: sweet oddity art oogie boogie crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart sweet oddity art pattern licensed with disney copyright owned by disney for selling dolls of this pattern you will want to contact disney licensing sale of dolls for their copyright is not allowed without licensing you may not alter or sell pattern without my permission sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 12 inches from foot to top of head with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the oogie and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 100g of main color color a green hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 24 mm safety eyes for round eyes triangular look eyes use 26 mm safety noses scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing black embroidery thread black felt spider party favor bow abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch double_crochet= double_crochet stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body crocheted from top of head to bottom of body with color a 1 make 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 4 2 single_crochet in each st around 3 increase single_crochet x 2= 6 4 single_crochet in each st around 5 increase 2 single_crochet x 2= 8 6 single_crochet in each st around 7 increase 3 single_crochet x 2= 10 8 single_crochet in each st around 9 increase 4 single_crochet x 2= 12 10 increase 5 single_crochet x 2= 14 11 single_crochet in each st around 12 increase 6 single_crochet x 2= 16 13 increase 7 single_crochet x 2= 18 14 single_crochet in each st around 15 increase 8 single_crochet x 2= 20 16 increase 9 single_crochet x 2= 22 17 single_crochet in each st around 18 increase 10 single_crochet x 2= 24 do not stuff the tip of the head some of the pictures show the tip of the head stuffed i decided not to stuff it much later 19-21 3 sl 6 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 sl= 24 22 increase 9 single_crochet decrease x 2 9 single_crochet increase= 24 23 single_crochet in each st around 24 7 single_crochet increase x 3= 27 25 3 sl 7 single_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 7 single_crochet 3 sl= 27 26 8
